Class VmSchedulerDRF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmScheduler
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmSchedulerTimeShared
        • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.VmSchedulerDRF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdaVmScheduler

    public class VmSchedulerDRF
extends org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmSchedulerTimeShared
implements RdaVmScheduler
    This VM scheduler is the Dominan Resource Fairness (DRF) VM scheduler to be used within the RDA module.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei
    See Also:
    MaxMinAlgorithm
